location.parking: Available out front or around back in the UL car park
location.directions: Located on the University of Limerick campus. Free parking available.

pricing.note: All appointments are €50 regardless of service type

policies.cancellation: Please provide notice if you need to cancel
policies.late_arrival: Please arrive on time for your appointment
policies.booking: Same-day bookings available subject to availability

faq.what_to_bring: Comfortable clothing suitable for physical examination
faq.first_visit: We'll assess your condition and create a treatment plan
faq.insurance: Private pay only - no insurance billing available
